statements: SELECT tag_id, tag_name, file_id FROM UserTags;
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM UserTags WHERE file_id = '1234567-890abc-def123456';
SELECT * FROM UserTags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT tag_id, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM UserTags GROUP BY tag_id;
SELECT DISTINCT tag_name FROM UserTags;
SELECT tag_name, file_id FROM UserTags WHERE tag_id = '7b58d930-7ab3-4e53-ba6c-5a7c2498ded2';
SELECT * FROM UserTags WHERE file_id = 'd0ca6d77-2b51-435d-89a2-7b10854e67c4' ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT tag_id, tag_name FROM UserTags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'F%' AND file_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT tag_id, file_id FROM UserTags WHERE tag_id IN ('7b58d930-7ab3-4e53-ba6c-5a7c2498ded2', 'd0ca6d77-2b51-435d-89a2-7b10854e67c4') ORDER BY tag_name;
SELECT COUNT(*), tag_name FROM UserTags GROUP BY tag_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserTags;
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM UserTags WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name FROM UserTags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM UserTags WHERE tag_id > 5 ORDER BY tag_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_tags FROM UserTags;
SELECT * FROM UserTags JOIN FileTags ON UserTags.tag_id = FileTags.tag_id
SELECT UserTags.tag_name, FileTags.file_id FROM UserTags, FileTags WHERE UserTags.tag_id = FileTags.tag_id
SELECT UserTags.tag_name, COUNT(FileTags.file_id) AS total_files FROM UserTags LEFT JOIN FileTags ON UserTags.tag_id = FileTags.tag_id GROUP BY UserTags.tag_name
SELECT * FROM UserTags WHERE tag_name LIKE '%data%' ORDER BY tag_id DESC
SELECT UserTags.tag_name, FileTags.file_id FROM UserTags JOIN FileTags ON UserTags.tag_id = FileTags.tag_id ORDER BY UserTags.tag_name ASC, FileTags.file_id DESC
SELECT * FROM user_tags;
SELECT tag_name, user_id FROM user_tags ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM file_data WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT tag_name FROM user_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 't%';
SELECT * FROM user_tags JOIN file_tags ON user_tags.user_id = file_tags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM user_tags WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, tag_name FROM user_tags WHERE tag_name = 'important';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM file_data WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT file_data.file_name, file_tags.tag_id FROM file_data JOIN file_tags ON file_data.file_id = file_tags.file_id;

SELECT user_tags.user_id, file_data.file_name FROM user_tags JOIN file_tags ON user_tags.user_id = file_tags.tag_id JOIN file_data ON file_tags.file_id = file_data.file_id ORDER BY user_tags.user_id, file_data.file_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tags;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM files ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT file_id, tag_id FROM file_tags WHERE tag_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY tag_id DESC;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM files JOIN file_tags ON files.file_id = file_tags.file_id WHERE tag_id = 1 ORDER BY file_name ASC;

SELECT file_id, file_name, tag_name FROM files JOIN file_tags ON files.file_id = file_tags.file_id JOIN tags ON file_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id WHERE tag_name = 'Important' AND file_name LIKE '%.pdf' ORDER BY file_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT file_id, file_name FROM files JOIN file_tags ON files.file_id = file_tags.file_id WHERE tag_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY file_id ASC, file_name ASC;

SELECT users.user_id, users.username, COUNT(file_tags.file_id) AS num_files FROM users LEFT JOIN files ON users.user_id = files.user_id LEFT JOIN file_tags ON files.file_id = file_tags.file_id GROUP BY users.user_id ORDER BY num_files DESC, users.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM tags;
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM tags GROUP BY tag_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM files ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM files WHERE file_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT f.file_name, t.tag_name FROM files f JOIN file_tags ft ON f.file_id = ft.file_id JOIN tags t ON ft.tag_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT u.username, t.tag_name FROM users u JOIN user_tags ut ON u.user_id = ut.user_id JOIN tags t ON ut.tag_id = t.tag_id;
